data.name: Administrative Region
data.description: The designated geographic location is an administrative region (state, county, province, district, municipality etc.)

data.name: Populated Place
data.description: The designated geographic location is a populated place (town, village, farm etc.)

data.name: Structure
data.description: The designated geopgraphic location is a structure (such as a school or a clinic)

data.name: Other Topographical Feature
data.description: The designated geographic location is a topographical feature, such as a mountain, a river, a forest
